survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in digital banking services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your bank's digital banking services (e.g., mobile app, online banking)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use your bank's digital banking services (e.g., mobile app, online banking)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your bank's digital banking services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure labels are clear.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with numeric labels.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your bank's digital banking services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use digital banking services?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use digital banking services?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using digital banking services in the past 6 months?

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using digital banking services in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue(s) you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended for detailed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue(s) you encountered.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your bank's digital banking services to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a 10-point scale for granularity. Ensure labels are clear.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with numeric labels.
